Summary: large black triangle spoted in knox county ky in m
divs: Sighting DetailsBarbourville, KentuckyI was about 14 or 15 when i was a passenger in car with granparents lookingoutside towards mountains saw a large black triangle over mountain in southeastKy Knox County very big wide as mountain top I seemed to forget about it for 10years until recently Ive started reliving the moment in my mind I saw anotherufo with a lot of other people around 1973 grandmother was at a teachers meetingin Canon Ky close to Barbourville Ky Knox County it followed us all the way toBarbourville was chevron shaped .
trends: There has been one other sighting in Barbourville
There were no other sightings in Barbourville on or around November 30th 2001
